entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Token 2007ffe is not valid in the scope of module System.ModuleHandle. #48182
  • Support for sdk directive #48179
    10.0.1xx
  • Support for property directive #48178
    10.0.1xx
  • Support for package directive #48177
    10.0.1xx
  • Single file editing experience spike #48176
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet run app.cs tooling experience #48175
    10.0.1xx
  • Support multiple files in `dotnet run` #48174
    10.0.1xx
  • Keep working directory clean in `dotnet run file.cs` #48172
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet run app.cs cli experience #48170
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `dotnet test` logic for MTP for splitting TargetFrameworks #48158

Closed

  • error MSB4014: Microsoft.Build.BackEnd.SdkResolution.SdkResolverException: The SDK resolver "Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver" failed while attempting to re solve the SDK "Microsoft.NET.Sdk". Exception: "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WorkloadManifestReader.WorkloadManifestCompositionException: .... #36392
    8.0.4xx
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.311] dotnet tool install command get access denied error if tools already installed #47906

PullRequests

Created

  • Update README.md #48187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48185
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Updating breaking change guidance #48184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Github Actions] Remove Branch Lockdown Labels on Branding Merge #48181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use global temp directory for run file outputs #48169
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Fix incorrect index in MSTest template #48168
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.3xx] Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #48167
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow additional package types with PackAsTool #48039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update package-table.md #48186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    Area-SdkResolvers
  • Auto enable retry when detected #48142
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAsset] Fix label not being correctly updated and add a unit test #48171
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Do not use live shims for tools packages in VMR #48153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable synchronization of sourcelink to the VMR #48166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Basic support for launchSettings in the new dotnet test #48063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify logic around _MTPBuild target #48097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make some targets in redist incremental #48102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48149
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-install: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Cleanup ApplyCompressionNegotiation.cs and ResolveCompressedAssets.cs #48082
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
